languages.text: {n}Голос в воксе умолкает. Спустя мгновение сомн голосов пытается ворваться в ваше сознание, но тщетно: повинуясь инстинкту, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}некогда{/d} научившему вас защищаться от темных сил, вы освобождаете свою голову от мыслей, а сердце — от тревоги. Удар, который должны были принять вы, проходит мимо.{/n}

{n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голос в воксе умолкает. Спустя мгновение сомн голосов пытается ворваться в ваше сознание, но тщетно: повинуясь инстинкту, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}некогда{/d} научившему вас защищаться от темных сил, вы освобождаете свою голову от мыслей, а сердце — от тревоги. Удар, который должны были принять вы, проходит мимо.{/n}

Relying on the lessons you learned in your past life, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

Relying on the lessons you learned in your past life, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. languages.text: {n}音阵装置中的声音消失了。过了一会儿，声音的洪流冲击着你的理智，但却没有对你造成任何伤害。你依靠在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}过去经历{/d}中学到的教训，本能般地消灭了思想与心中所有怀疑，保护自己免受黑暗力量的伤害。你躲过了这场针对你的攻击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵装置中的声音消失了。过了一会儿，声音的洪流冲击着你的理智，但却没有对你造成任何伤害。你依靠在过去经历中学到的教训，本能般地消灭了思想与心中所有怀疑，保护自己免受黑暗力量的伤害。你躲过了这场针对你的攻击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme in dem Vox verstummt. Einen Augenblick später kracht eine Flut von Wellen gegen deinen Verstand, kann dir jedoch keinen Schaden zufügen. Du verlässt dich auf die Lektionen, die du in deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}früheren Leben{/d} gelernt hast. Instinktiv befreist du deinen Verstand von allen Gedanken und dein Herz von allen Zweifeln, um dich von den dunklen Mächten abzuschirmen. Du hast den Angriff gegen dich pariert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme in dem Vox verstummt. Einen Augenblick später kracht eine Flut von Wellen gegen deinen Verstand, kann dir jedoch keinen Schaden zufügen. Du verlässt dich auf die Lektionen, die du in deinem Leben bisher gelernt hast. Instinktiv befreist du deinen Verstand von allen Gedanken und dein Herz von allen Zweifeln, um dich von den dunklen Mächten abzuschirmen. Du hast den Angriff gegen dich pariert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le vox sombre dans le silence. Un instant plus tard, un torrent de voix assaille votre esprit, mais en vain : vous évacuez immédiatement toute pensée parasite et débarrassez votre cœur du moindre doute, exactement comme vous l'avez appris dans votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}vie passée{/d}, pour vous protéger de ce sombre pouvoir. Vous avez réussi à contrer l'attaque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox sombre dans le silence. Un instant plus tard, un torrent de voix assaille votre esprit, mais en vain : vous évacuez immédiatement toute pensée parasite et débarrassez votre cœur du moindre doute, exactement comme vous l'avez appris, pour vous protéger de ce sombre pouvoir. Vous avez réussi à contrer l'attaque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El voco calla. Al cabo de un momento, un torrente de voces se abate contra tu cordura, pero es en vano. Gracias a las lecciones de tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}vida pasada{/d}, instintivamente borras todo pensamiento de tu mente y destierras toda duda de tu corazón, escudándote contra los poderes siniestros. Has bloqueado el ataque que iba dirigido contra ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco calla. Al cabo de un momento, un torrente de voces se abate contra tu cordura, pero es en vano. Gracias a las lecciones de tu vida pasada, instintivamente borras todo pensamiento de tu mente y destierras toda duda de tu corazón, escudándote contra los poderes siniestros. Has bloqueado el ataque que iba dirigido contra ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォクスからの声が静まり返った。その刹那、声の奔流があなたの理性を打ち砕こうと襲いかかるが、あなたに害を及ぼすことはなかった。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}前世{/d}で学んだ教訓を頼りに、あなたは本能的にあらゆる思考を無にし、あらゆる疑念を取り除いて、闇の力から身を守る。あなたを標的にした攻撃を見事にかわしたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォックスからの声がシンと静かになった。その刹那、声の波があなたの健全な精神に襲いかかるが、あなたが傷つくことはなかった。前世で学んだ教訓を頼りに、あなたは本能的にあらゆる思考をクリアにし、あらゆる疑念を胸に秘め、闇の力から身を守る。あなたを標的にした攻撃を見事にかわしたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vokstaki ses kesiliyor. Bir süre sonra; akıl sağlığını hedef alan, seslerden oluşan bir fırtına başlıyor ancak sana herhangi bir zarar veremiyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Geçmişinde{/d} öğrendiğin dersler sayesinde içgüdüsel olarak zihnini tüm düşüncelerden, kalbini ise tüm şüphelerden azat ediyor ve kendini karanlık güçlerden koruyorsun. Seni hedef alan saldırıyı savuşturuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The voice in the vox falls silent. A moment later, a torrent of voices crashes against your sanity, yet fails to do you any harm. Relying on the lessons you learned in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}past life{/d}, you instinctively clear your mind of all thought and your heart of all doubt to shield yourself from the dark powers. You have parried the strike aimed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voksundaki ses kesiliyor. Bir süre sonra, akıl sağlığını hedef alan, seslerden oluşan bir fırtına başlıyor ancak sana herhangi bir zarar veremiyor. Geçmişinde öğrendiğin dersler sayesinde içgüdüsel olarak zihnini tüm düşüncelerden, kalbini ise tüm şüphelerden azat ediyor ve kendini karanlık güçlere karşı koruyorsun. Seni hedef alan saldırıyı savuşturuyorsun.{/n}
